= How to Guides =

Part of the appeal of using er9x is that it allows developers and hackers to configure the hardware in a way that suits them.  

There are however many proven methods to configure the hardware & software.  Much of this information is avaliable on the rcgroups.com thread (http://www.rcgroups.com/forums/showthread.php?t=1266162) however unless you are actively involved in the project keeping up to date with the new techniques and ideas is impossible.

The Guides shown on in this section are a selection of the best - and widely used mods to help you get started!
